name: Space Defender (itch) (enekoatxa)
description:
Little RTS style tower defense game, developed to learn new skills in game development. Learned skills:

- RTS style camera controls

- Building mechanics, and object instantiation with point and click controls.

- Basic Blender modelling skills

- Shader creation with shader graph

- Music and SFX creation

- Text file read/write interactions (used to load enemy waves and levels)

- Animation basics

- UI Tutorial creation with video, text and image integration.

- Gameoject interaction (programming turrets and enemies AI)

- Basic building systems (using and gaining resources, building, destroying and upgrading turrets)
